ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Name = "Insurance Exchange" && NOT( CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESTGB") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESTFR") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESTBE") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESTNL") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESPBE") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c , "ESPGB") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c, "ESPFR") || CONTAINS( New_Insurance_Reference__c, "ESPNL") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Incorrect format for New Insurance Reference. The reference must start with either: "ESTGB" "ESTFR" "ESTBE" "ESTNL" "ESPBE" "ESPGB" "ESPFR" "ESPNL"
